member.name: M:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.Converter.MarkupConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value.
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.value: true if [spin automatic reverse]; otherwise, false.
